content.rendered:
FreeMusic Distribution

Get your music on Spotify, Apple Music, Wynk, Hungama, YouTube, JioSaavn, Instagram and more. We distribute independent artists and labels’ music all over the world absolutely free.

Join for free

Our Services

Content ID

Free YouTube & Facebook Content ID [Believe Music]

Callertune

We make Caller Tune of your best songs

OAC

Claim your YouTube Official Artist Channel

Label Name

Upload your music with your own label name

Previous
Next

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT?

Dream Records is a trusted and experienced music distributor with a proven track record of success. We offer free music distribution to major Indian platforms, including Gaana, JioSaavn, WynkMusic, Resso, and Spotify. We also offer a variety of other services to help artists and labels promote their music, including marketing, analytics, and sync licensing.

0 +

Hear From Our Artists/Labels

Next
